column1: (a) No culture possible, but typical histopathology and PCR positive for MTB complex.
(b) The figure in parentheses may increase as some of those incidents have not been closed and ongoing live testing may identify further cases.
(c) A premises on which both alpacas and llamas were kept.
(d) Three of those were epidemiologically linked via movements/purchases of infected animals and could therefore be considered one TB incident.
(e) Location was incorrectly referred to as Avon in previous updates.
(f) M. bovis could not be isolated from alpacas on this farm, but the case was confirmed on epidemiological grounds (test positive animals traced from an M. bovis positive herd in Devon).
Data to be updated on a quarterly basis - updated by Defra TB Programme 03 February 2016
